DOC.brief_summary: This study compare analgesic efficacy single-dose novel ibuprofen formulation placebo acetaminophen treatment post-surgical dental pain follow `` wisdom '' tooth ( third molar ) removal .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating A Novel Ibuprofen Formulation In The Treatment Of Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Normal , healthy male females 16 40 year age Outpatients moderate severe postoperative pain ( confirm Visual Analog ScalePain Severity Rating [ VASPSR ] score least 50 mm 100 mm VAS PSR ) follow surgical extraction two third molar , least one must partial complete bony mandibular impaction Use follow preoperative medication ( ) /anesthetic ( ) : topical benzocaine , short act parenteral ( local ) anesthetic ( mepivacaine lidocaine ) without vasoconstrictor and/or nitrous oxide Pregnancy breastfeed Alcohol substance abuse Any serious medical psychiatric disorder History stomach ulcer , stomach bleed , bleed disorder Use prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) drug administration ibuprofen nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) ; acetaminophen ( APAP ) ; codeine opioid contraindicate ( include : opioids , antipsychotic , antianxiety agent , central nervous system depressant [ include alcohol ] )
DOC.keyword: Pain follow third molar extraction ( wisdom tooth )
